Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.model.powers

Class Mortal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.model.powers.Power
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.model.powers.Mortal
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Chronus, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hestia, Minotaur, Pan, Poseidon, Prometheus, Triton, Zeus
public class Mortal
extends Power
This class describe the natural behaviours of workers during a match. The Mortal has no power
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • onBeginTurn

      public void onBeginTurn​(Player player, Game game)
      Called on the beginning of a player turn (both own and enemy)

      Checks valid and blocked moves If selected worker cannot make valid moves or all the moves are blocked, lose condition is set true

      Specified by:
      onBeginTurn in class Power
      Parameters:
      player - current player
      game - current game

    • onEndTurn

      public void onEndTurn​(Player player, Game game)
      Called upon finish turn
      Specified by:
      onEndTurn in class Power
      Parameters:
      player - that is ending his turn
      game - current game

    • onBuild

      public void onBuild​(Player player, Worker worker, Point where, Game game)
      Called after input from the view that asks for a build on given position

      Checks if you have to build a dome or not in the selected position

      Specified by:
      onBuild in class Power
      Parameters:
      player - current player
      worker - current selected worker
      where - point where you want to build
      game - current game

    • onMove

      public void onMove​(Player player, Worker worker, Point where, Game game)
      Called after input from the view that asks for a move on given position

      If worker moved from level 2 to level 3, the player has won the game
      Locks the chosen worker for the next TurnState

      Specified by:
      onMove in class Power
      Parameters:
      player - current player
      worker - current selected worker
      where - point where you want to move
      game - current game

    • shouldShowInteraction

      public boolean shouldShowInteraction​(Game game)
      Called when the player decides to show the bottom for interaction or not By default the bottom is not shown
      Specified by:
      shouldShowInteraction in class Power
      Parameters:
      game - current game
      Returns:
      boolean is set false, so the bottom is not shown

    • getBlockedMoves

      public java.util.List<Point> getBlockedMoves​(Player player, Worker worker, Game game)
      Gets the list of unavailable moves for the enemy worker

      By default list of blocked moves is empty. All moves are allowed

      Specified by:
      getBlockedMoves in class Power
      Parameters:
      player - current player playing
      worker - worker to get blocked moves of
      game - current game
      Returns:
      list of blocked moves

    • getValidMoves

      public java.util.List<Point> getValidMoves​(Worker worker, Game game)
      Called when you want to list all the valid moves that a worker can make

      Excludes from possible moves: if on Move: - positions with other workers - positions with domes on them - positions with upward height difference less than 2 if on Build: - positions with domes on them - positions with workers on them

      Specified by:
      getValidMoves in class Power
      Parameters:
      worker - to get valid moves of
      game - current game
      Returns:
      list of valid moves

    • canCompleteValidTurn

      public boolean canCompleteValidTurn​(Worker worker, Game game)
      Called when the player decides to show the bottom for interaction or not
      Specified by:
      canCompleteValidTurn in class Power
      Parameters:
      worker - current worker
      game - current game
      Returns:
      true if the GUI needs to enable the bottom for interaction

    • undo

      Returns to the previous turn state, should be customized for powers that can possibly do lots of moves
